title: Lost in the Deep End
description: When I came to Earth on a short-term mission, I never expected to fall in love with a human.The moment her eyes meet mine, I recognize that Elizabeth is my fated one—my Si’an T’kara.But I can never tell her. If I form the mind link with her to claim her as my fated one, she’ll know the dark secret I carry within me—the horror of my race.The more time we spend together, the more difficult it is to deny my desire to claim her.But I cannot help but wonder: Would she fear me if she knew the truth about my people, and why we have come to her world?***TRILOGY NOW COMPLETE! This is a slow burn romance that follows the same couple over three books. The steam will build with each book in this series.***
author: Jessica Grayson
